title: Edit a service design component
content:
Double-click a component, click the Edit icon , or click the gear icon and select Edit Component.

The Edit Component dialog allows you to configure attributes such as Processing Order and Pattern, configure component properties, configure lifecycle actions, configure user operations, and configure resource offerings.

Use the functional area tabs to edit a service component:

  • Overview Tab
  • Properties Tab
  • Lifecycle Actions for Service Components
  • User Operations for Service Components
  • Associate Resource Offerings with Service Components
